inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed diagnosis of Hodgkin's disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least 10% of malignant cells react with anti-Tac
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Tac positivity in infiltrating T cells
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky performance status of at least 50
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Female patients of child bearing potential will be tested for pregnancy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) antibody positive
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with symptomatic disease that is due to malignant involvement of the central nervous system
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with active second primary cancer
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients requiring urgent chemotherapy or radiation therapy for management of their malignancy
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a large pericardial effusion with Burkitt's lymphoma, but is not eligible due to exclusion criteria.
